name: "Where To?"
description:
Oh god- Here it is.

I had high hopes for this, but I'm just not quite at the stage where I can wip out a game in two days. Despite that, it was a fun experience, and I'm happy to have gotten something into the Jam. My first "finished" game, too! If I hadn't had so many issues with the physics and wheel joints, it would have been much better though.

Essentially, you sit in the back of the car and shout orders at the driver. Through a small text box. Enjoy?
